scripts.build: pnpm run ref:gen:all && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" vocs build
scripts.ref:gen:demo:blog: cp ../apps/embed-demo-blog/README.md pages/demos/blog/index.mdx && echo '{/* automatically generated doc. dont edit this file - pnpm run ref:gen:demo:blog */}' | cat - pages/demos/blog/index.mdx > temp && mv temp pages/demos/blog/index.mdx
scripts.ref:gen:demo:demo: cp ../apps/demo/README.md pages/demos/custom-integration/index.mdx && echo '{/* automatically generated doc. dont edit this file - pnpm run ref:gen:demo:demo */}' | cat - pages/demos/custom-integration/index.mdx > temp && mv temp pages/demos/custom-integration/index.mdx
scripts.ref:gen:demo:react-native: cp ../apps/demo-rn-expo/README.md pages/demos/react-native-integration/index.mdx && echo '{/* automatically generated doc. dont edit this file - pnpm run ref:gen:demo:react-native */}' | cat - pages/demos/react-native-integration/index.mdx > temp && mv temp pages/demos/react-native-integration/index.mdx
scripts.ref:gen:demo: pnpm run ref:gen:demo:blog && pnpm run ref:gen:demo:demo && pnpm run ref:gen:demo:react-native

scripts.ref:gen:protocol: solidity-docgen -o pages/protocol-reference -i ../packages/protocol/src/ --solc-module solc -t templates/solidity-codegen && echo '{/* automatically generated doc. dont edit this file - pnpm run ref:gen:protocol */}' | cat - pages/protocol-reference/index.mdx > temp && mv temp pages/protocol-reference/index.mdx
scripts.ref:gen:indexer:index: cp ../apps/indexer/README.md pages/indexer-reference/index.mdx && echo '{/* automatically generated doc. dont edit this file - pnpm run ref:gen:indexer:index */}' | cat - pages/indexer-reference/index.mdx > temp && mv temp pages/indexer-reference/index.mdx
scripts.ref:gen:indexer: npm run ref:gen:indexer:index && NEYNAR_API_KEY=123 SKIP_DRIZZLE_SCHEMA_DETECTION=1 WEBHOOK_SECRET=secret DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/postgres tsx --import ./scripts/ponder-module-register.mjs scripts/generate-indexer-openapi-spec.ts
scripts.ref:gen:all: pnpm run ref:gen:protocol && pnpm run ref:gen:sdk && pnpm run ref:gen:indexer && pnpm run ref:gen:demo
